https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fO3CWFwi009lsCJhwZWTt10euOJ.jpg This Academy Award-winning documentary takes a look at children born after the 1986 Chernobyl nuclear plant disaster who have been born with a deteriorated heart condition. Chernobyl Heart
